data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Maurice Dufrasne have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Brugge get the game underway.
In the minute 20, Maxime Lestienne (Liege) has received a yellow card from Nicolas Laforge.
Clinton Mata for Brugge has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Krepin Diatta gives Brugge a 0-1 lead in Liege.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Liege.
The second-half has commenced. Liege with the kick-off.
Noa Lang is on a sub for Emmanuel Dennis for Brugge.
In the minute 61, Liege have been given a penalty at Stade Maurice Dufrasne...
Philippe Clement is making the team's second substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Youssouph Badji replacing Michael Krmencik.
The home team have replaced Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez with Obbi Oulare. This is the first substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
In the minute 71, Mats Rits (Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team have replaced Maxime Lestienne with Duje Cop. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
Brugge make their third substitution with Odilon Kossounou replacing Simon Deli.
An attacking Liege player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Nicolas Gavory.
Philippe Montanier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Laurent Jans replacing Michel Ange Balikwisha.
